name: Space Trader (imIsaac)
description:
//Instructions:

Left Click: Select planets, cities, and buttons

Right Click:  Open inventory and back out of menus and planets

Middle Click/Escape: Opens the escape menu

Extra Tips:

It takes 10 fuel to travel to a planet and 50 fuel to jump to a different system so watch out. However it costs no fuel to land on space stations which is also where you can refill your tank. Money is earned by completing quests which can be found on the many different planets. If you don't know where to go for a given quest try asking one of the cities for directions they will give you the name of the planet that the city you're looking for is on, be careful your spaceship can't remember the planet's name so that's all on you.  Try to survive as long a possible.

In this game you travel around a small universe delivering items to different planets. This is the first game I have ever finished and currently is just the bare bones of what I want it to be. I plan on adding new updates to it eventually so if you don't like it now maybe come back later and try it again (But I'm not your dad so I can't tell you what to do).  Enjoy my game.
